Verses: 1 savul Enbavan Innung Karththarudaiya Seesharaip Bayamuruththik Kolai Seyyumpadi Seerip Piradhaana Aasaariyaridaththirkup Poi;

2 indha Maarkkaththaaraagiya Purusharaiyaagilum Sthireegalaiyaagilum Thaan Kandupidiththaal, Avargalaik Katti Erusalemukkuk Konduvarumpadi, Thamaskuvilulla Jebaaalayangalukku Nirubangalaik Kettu Vaanginaan.
3 avan Pirayaanamaaip Poi, Thamaskuvukkuch Sameebiththabodhu Sadidhiyile Vaanaththilirundhu Oru Oli Avanaich Sutrip Piragaasiththadhu;
4 avan Tharaiyile Vizhundhaan. Appozhudhu: Savule, Savule, Nee Ennai En Thunbappaduththugiraai Endru Thannudane Sollugira Oru Saththaththaik Kettaan.
5 adharku Avan: Aandavare, Neer Yaar, Endraan. Adharkuk Karththar: Nee Thunbappaduththugira Yesu Naane, Mullil Udhaikkiradhu Unakkuk Kadinamaam Endraar.

6 avan Nadungith Thigaiththu: Aandavare, Naan Ennaseyyach Siththamaayirukkireer Endraan. Adharkuk Karththar: Nee Ezhundhu, Pattanaththukkulle Po, Nee Seyyavendiyadhu Ange Unakkuch Sollappadum Endraar.
7 avanudanekoodap Pirayaanampannina Manushargal Saththaththaik Kettum Oruvaraiyung Kaanaamal Biramiththu Nindraargal.
8 savul Tharaiyilirundhezhundhu, Than Kangalaith Thirandhabodhu Oruvaraiyung Kaanavillai. Appozhudhu Kailaagu Koduththu, Avanaith Thamaskuvukkuk Koottikkonduponaargal
9 avan Moondru Naal Paarvaiyillaadhavanaaip Pusiyaamalum Kudiyaamalum Irundhaan.
10 thamaskuvile Ananiyaa Ennumperulla Oru Seeshan Irundhaan. Avanukkuk Karththar Dharisanamaagi: Ananiyaave, Endraar. Avan: Aandavare, Idho, Adiyen Endraan.
11 appozhudhu Karththar: Nee Ezhundhu Nerththeruvu Ennappatta Theruvukkuppoi, Yoodhaavin Veettile Tharsupattanaththaanaagiya Savul Ennum Perulla Oruvanaith Thedu; Avan Ippozhudhu Jebampannugiraan.
12 ananiyaa Ennum Perulla Orumanushan Thannidaththil Varavum, Thaan Paarvaiyadaiyavumpadi Thanmel Kaivaikkavum Dharisanankandaan Endraar.
13 adharku Ananiyaa: Aandavare, Indha Manushan Erusalemilulla Ummudaiya Parisuththavaangalukku Eththanaiyo Pollaangugalaich Seydhaanendru Avanaikkuriththu Anegaraal Kelvippattirukkiren.
14 ingeyum Ummudaiya Naamaththaith Thozhudhukollugira Yaavaraiyung Kattumpadi Avan Piradhaana Aasaariyargalaal Adhigaaram Petrirukkiraane Endraan.
15 adharkuk Karththar: Nee Po; Avan Purajaadhigalukkum Raajaakkalukkum Isravel Buththirarukkum Ennudaiya Naamaththai Arivikkiradharkaaga Naan Therindhukonda Paaththiramaayirukkiraan.
16 avan Ennudaiya Naamaththinimiththam Evvalavaaip Paadupadavendumenbadhai Naan Avanukkuk Kaanbippen Endraar.

17 appozhudhu Ananiyaa Poi, Veettukkul Piravesiththu, Avanmel Kaiyai Vaiththu Sagodharanaagiya Savule, Nee Vandhavazhiyile Unakkuth Dharisanamaana Yesuvaagiya Karththar, Nee Paarvaiyadaiyumpadikkum Parisuththa Aaviyinaal Nirappappadumpadikkum Ennai Anuppinaar Endraan.
18 udane Avan Kangalilirundhu Meen Sedhilgal Pondravaigal Vizhundhadhu. Avan Paarvaiyadaindhu, Ezhundhirundhu, Gnaanasnaanam Petraan.
19 pinbu Avan Pojanampanni Belappattaan. Savul Thamaskuvilulla Seesharudane Silanaal Irundhu,
20 thaamadhamindri, Kiristhu Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranendru Aalayangalile Pirasangiththaan.

21 kettavargalellaarum Aachchariyappattu: Erusalemil Indha Naamaththaith Thozhudhukollugiravargalai Naasamaakki, Ingeyum Appadippattavargalaik Kattip Piradhaana Aasaariyargalidaththirkuk Kondupogumpadi Vandhavan Ivanallavaa Endraargal.
22 savul Adhigamaagath Thidankondu, Ivare Kiristhuvendru Thirushtaandhappaduththi, Thamaskuvil Kudiyirukkira Yoodhargalaik Kalangappanninaan.
23 aneganaal Sendrapinbu, Yoodhargal Avanaik Kolaiseyyumpadi Aalosanaipanninaargal.
24 avargaludaiya Yosanai Savulukkuth Theriyavandhadhu. Avanaik Kolaiseyyumpadi Avargal Iravum Pagalum Kottaivaasalgalaik Kaaththukkondirundhaargal.
25 seeshargal Raaththiriyile Avanaik Koottikkondupoi, Oru Koodaiyile Vaiththu, Madhilvazhiyaai Irakkivittaargal.
26 savul Erusalemukku Vandhu, Seesharudane Serndhukollap Paarththaan; Avargal Avanaich Seeshanendru Nambaamal Ellaarum Avanukkup Bayandhirundhaargal.

27 appozhudhu Barnabaa Enbavan Avanaich Serththukkondu, Apposthalaridaththil Azhaiththukkondupoi, Vazhiyile Avan Karththaraik Kanda Vidhaththaiyum, Avar Avanudane Pesinadhaiyum, Thamaskuvil Avan Yesuvin Naamaththinaale Dhairiyamaaip Pirasangiththadhaiyum Avargalukku Vivariththuch Sonnaan.
28 adhanpinbu Avan Erusalemile Avargalidaththil Pokkum Varaththumaayirundhu;
29 karththaraagiya Yesuvin Naamaththinaale Dhairiyamaaip Pirasangiththu, Girekkarudane Pesith Tharkkiththaan; Avargalo Avanaik Kolaiseyya Eththanampanninaargal.
30 sagodhararo Adhai Arindhu, Avanaich Sechariyaavukku Azhaiththukkondupoi, Tharsuvukku Anuppivittaargal.

31 appozhudhu Yoodheyaa Galileyaa Samaariyaa Naadugalilengum Sabaigal Samaadhaanam Petru, Bakthiviruththiyadaindhu, Karththarukkup Bayappadugira Bayaththodum, Parisuththa Aaviyin Aarudhalodum Nadandhu Perugina.
32 pedhuru Poi Ellaaraiyum Sandhiththuvarugaiyil, Avan Liththaa Oorile Kudiyirukkira Parisuththavaangalidaththirkum Ponaan.
33 ange Ettu Varushamaaik Kattilinmel Thimirvaadhamullavanaaik Kidandha Aineyaa Ennum Perulla Oru Manushanaik Kandaan.
34 pedhuru Avanaip Paarththu: Aineyaave, Yesukiristhu Unnaik Gunamaakkugiraar; Nee Ezhundhu, Un Padukkaiyai Neeye Pottukkol Endraan. Udane Avan Ezhundhirundhaan.
35 liththaavilum Saaronilum Kudiyirundhavargalellaarum Avanaik Kandu, Karththaridaththil Thirumbinaargal.

36 yoppaa Pattanaththil Girekkupbaashaiyile Thorkaal Endru Arththankollum Thabeeththaal Ennum Perudaiya Oru Seeshi Irundhaal; Aval Narkiriyaigalaiyum Dharumangalaiyum Migudhiyaaich Seydhukonduvandhaal.
37 annaatkalil Aval Viyaadhippattu Maranamadaindhaal. Avalaik Kulippaatti, Melveettile Kidaththivaiththaargal.

38 yoppaa Pattanam Liththaa Oorukkuch Sameebamaanapadiyinaale, Pedhuru Avvidaththil Irukkiraanendru Seeshargal Kelvippattu, Thaamadhamillaamal Thangalidaththil Varavendumendru Sollumpadi Irandu Manusharai Avanidaththirku Anuppinaargal.

39 pedhuru Ezhundhu, Avargaludane Koodapponaan. Avan Poich Serndhapozhudhu, Avargal Avanai Melveettukku Azhaiththukkondu Ponaargal. Appozhudhu Vidhavaigalellaarum Azhudhu, Thorkaal Thangaludane Kooda Irukkaiyil Seydhirundha Angigalaiyum Vasthirangalaiyum Kaanbiththu, Avanaich Soozhndhu Nindraargal.

40 pedhuru Ellaaraiyum Veliye Pogachseydhu, Muzhangaarpadiyittu Jebampanni, Piredhaththin Puramaaith Thirumbi: Thabeeththaale, Ezhundhiru Endraan. Appozhudhu Aval Than Kangalaith Thirandhu, Pedhuruvaip Paarththu Utkaarndhaal.
41 avan Avalukkuk Kaikoduththu, Avalai Ezhundhirukkappanni, Parisuththavaangalaiyum Vidhavaikalaiyum Azhaiththu, Avalai Uyirullavalaaga Avargal Mun Niruththinaan.
42 idhu Yoppaa Pattanam Engum Theriyavandhadhu. Appozhudhu Anegar Karththaridaththil Visuvaasamullavargalaanaargal.
43 pinbu Avan Yoppaa Pattanaththil Thol Padhanidugiravanaagiya Seemon Ennum Oruvanidaththil Aneganaal Thangiyirundhaan.
